messages: In Fithusim Life, you will start at the bottom of the rankings. The goal of is to reach for the Top 6 rank in order to be eligible for one of the King races in the RS League.

To complete Fithusim Life for one Generation, you must win at least one King race. There are a total of 3 Generations and must be completed in chronological order. Also remember, fast cars will influence your ranking slowly compared to slower cars.
In Driving Revolution, match the arrows and throttle buttons on the grid, by using the buttons in the embed. While driving, there are driving indications, representing whether to accelerate or brake.
For more detailed instructions, please read the Driving Revolution section in the manual.
